Instruction: Add the text string "Project A Overview" to the file XY23B.pdf on page 3, in the first rectangle. Set the font to Arial, font size to 14, and text alignment to center.
Groundtruth:
import fitz
import PDFbf

# File path
filepath = "XY23B.pdf"
doc = fitz.open(filepath)

# Instantiate the annotation extractor
annoextractor = PDFbf.extractanno(doc=doc)

# Page 3
pagenumber = 2  # Page 3 corresponds to index 2

# First rectangle on page 3
rectangleorder = 0
rectangle, rfpoint = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber, rectangleorder=rectangleorder)

# Prepare the argument for text addition
argument = dict(
    clip=rectangle,
    text="Project A Overview",
    font="Arial",
    fontsize=14,
    align=fitz.TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER
)

# Add the text
Text_manipulator = PDFbf.manipulate_text(
    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber,
    clip=argument.get("clip"),
    text=argument.get("text"),
    font=argument.get("font"),
    fontsize=argument.get("fontsize"),
    align=argument.get("align")
)
doc = Text_manipulator.addtext()

# Save the updated file
updated_file = filepath[:-4] + "_updated.pdf"
doc.save(updated_file)
